id.description: The decentralized identifier representing the profile in the DID format.

type.description: A string indicating the type of the profile.

checksum.description: A checksum value for data integrity validation.

name.description: A human-readable name for the profile.

previous.description: Reference to a previous version of the profile data.

description.description: A detailed description of the profile.

short_description.description: A concise description of the profile.

docs_url.description: URL to documentation for the profile data.

version.description: The version of the profile data, following semver.

tags.description: Tags associated with the profile data.

definitions.description: Defines capabilities or services related to the profile data.

proof.description: Information related to proofing the authenticity of the profile data.
